```python3
from Crypto.Util.number import *

flag = bytes_to_long(open("flag.txt", "rb").read())
e = 0x10001
p, q, r = [getPrime(1024) for _ in "123"]
c = pow(flag, e, p * q * r)

Now count to 3
one = p * q * r
two = p + q + r
three = p**3 + q**3 + r**3

print(f"{one = }")
print(f"{two = }")
print(f"{three = }")
print(f"{c = }")

'''
one = 
two = 
three = 
c = 
'''
```
 - Ta có: $$one =  p * q * r $$ $$two = p + q * r $$ $$three = p^3 * q^3 * r^3$$
 - Chall này rất đơn giản chỉ cần giải hệ phương trình với thư viện sympy và get flag.
 - Solution bằng python
```python3
from sympy import symbols, solve
from Crypto.Util.number import *

one = 
two = 
three = 
c = 

p, q, r = symbols('p q r')
eq1 = p * q * r - one
eq2 = p + q + r - two
eq3 = p**3 + q**3 + r**3 - three

solution = solve((eq1, eq2, eq3), (p, q, r))


for sol in solution:
    print(sol)
p , q, r = (, , )
print(p*q*r)

flag = pow(c, pow(65537, -1, (p-1)*(q-1)*(r-1)), p * q * r)
print(long_to_bytes(flag))
```
> FLAG : W1{I_love_Nancy_Kwai:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rgZNyovtcCI}
